findings.rationale: The indefinite duration may expose the Receiving Party to perpetual obligations, which can create operational challenges and potential liability for ongoing confidentiality breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to disputes over what constitutes confidential material, potentially resulting in unintentional breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.
